department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Reconstruction of the Sept-Îles airport runway
description: This tender is concerned with seeking proposals for the project of reconstructing the Sept-Îles airport runway. Technologies involved: civil engineering. Practices dependant on supertech governing territory of Quebec.
full_summary:
Tender Announcement: EF997-240490 - Consulting Services for Sept-Îles Airport Runway Reconstruction
================================================================================

**Notice Title:**
English: 
EF997-240490 - Consulting Services for Sept-Îles Airport Runway Reconstruction
French: 
EF997-240490 - Services expert-conseils pour la reconstruction de la piste de l'aéroport de Sept-Îles

**Reference:** WS4110039234-Doc4110120318

**Status:** This tender has expired.

**Summary:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of Transport, is seeking bids for the provision of consulting services for the reconstruction of the Sept-Îles airport runway. The services required for this project include professional engineering services. The selected consulting firm will be expected to provide a team of experts who can provide advice and support throughout the project.

**Key Dates:**

* Solicitation published: July 21, 2023
* Tender closing date: September 19, 2023, 2:00 PM (EDT)
* Expected contract start date: September 21, 2023
* Expected contract end date: December 31, 2028

**Details:**

* Location: Sept-Îles, Quebec, Canada
* Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Method of procurement: Competitive, open bidding
* Evaluation criteria: Highest combined rating of technical merit and price
* Trade agreements: This tender is subject to trade agreements with various countries.

**Requirements:**

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by 2:00 PM (EDT) on the closing date.
* Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of the Department of Transport, is issuing this RFP for the provision of consulting services for the reconstruction of the Sept-Îles airport runway.

**Contact:**

* Joel Lussier
  joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Related Documents:**

* A full description of the tender, including the requirements and evaluation criteria, is available in the solicitation document.
